subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Horse Racing
Horses
Curlin (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Horsemen and horseplayers cannot resist debating now that the Breeders’ Cup is over and the best equine athletes will be taking a breather until February.
